message: Let's be fair, Bob. This offer gives us both a good deal.
Let's try a bit more in my favor, Alice.
I need a better deal than that, Bob. Time is running out for both of us.
Come on, Alice. Meet me halfway. We're both losing out to inflation here.
Bob, my offer is still on the table.  Let's close this deal before inflation eats away at the value!
I'm not backing down, Alice. Inflation's hurting me more than you. I need a better cut.
Bob, this is getting ridiculous. Take this offer or you'll be left with crumbs!
